advancements.icyincitement.description: Fill an Empty Sprinkler with a real snow production source
advancements.icyincitement.title: Icy Incitement
mvalue.icyincitement.max_snowballs.desc: The maximum number of snowballs the Snowball Sprinkler can hold
mvalue.icyincitement.recharge_rate.desc:
The rate at which the Snowball Sprinkler recharges snowballs per tick
At a rate of 1, the meter will never go down
mvalue.icyincitement.recoil.desc: The amount of recoil the Snowball Sprinkler applies to the player when fired
mvalue.icyincitement.slowdown.desc: Should you be slowed while firing the Snowball Sprinkler
mvalue.icyincitement.snow_damage.desc: How much should the Snowball Sprinkler damage enemies per hit
mvalue.icyincitement.snow_gravity.desc: How much gravity should Snowball Sprinkler snowballs experience?
mvalue.icyincitement.snow_healing.desc: How much should the Snowball Sprinkler heal snowy entities per hit
